data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Shabeellaha Dhexe, Somalia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shabeellaha Dhexe, Somalia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 12 believers in Shabeellaha Dhexe to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Shabeellaha Dhexe that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Shabeellaha Dhexe, Somalia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the South Asian, general people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Shabeellaha Dhexe.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Shabeellaha Dhexe, Somalia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Shabeellaha Dhexe, Somalia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Shabeellaha Dhexe
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Arab, Omani, Mahra, Midgan, Baloch, Southern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (159,000), Arab, Omani (90,000), Mahra (4,200), Midgan (7,100), Baloch, Southern (9,400)
